capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been reading about Harry Potter and his talents are quite impressive. He's a Quidditch player, which is no easy feat considering the skill required to chase down those Bludgers on broomsticks. I'm pretty sure that's one of his notable skills.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of harry before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So, I've been thinking about Hagrid's age and it seems like he's definitely an adult. I mean, he's been around for a while, teaching Care of Magical Creatures at Hogwarts, and he's got that rugged, outdoorsy vibe going on. I'd say his age is pretty certain, and I'm feeling quite positive about it - it's just one of those things that makes sense when you think about it.

So, I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult, not a kid. I think it's kind of cool that he's been working with us for so long, even if he does have a bit of a wild streak sometimes.
